text: I believe that when a woman flees the only home she's ever known with her 4-year-old son and begs the United States of America for asylum, she deserves a fair hearing. I believe that every human being has worth. We must do better.

Today, I'm in McAllen, TX. What I've witnessed here is truly disturbing. People are being held in cages – there's no other way to describe it. There are children by themselves. Mothers with young babies. They have nothing but the clothes on their backs http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DgflkjzXUAUvJXA.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1011014815140208641/vid/320x180/oH-BAl66-Lt2Mial.mp4?tag=2
Worrisome report that #Venezuela’s security forces continue to repress and murder its people.

By outlawing marijuana, the federal government puts communities of color, small businesses, and public health and safety at risk. I talked with @Chris_topher_Mc of @WBSM1420 about my bipartisan bill to end the federal ban on marijuana. http://wbsm.com/opinion-chris-mccarthy-senator-warren-is-working-in-washington-video/
I remain committed to fighting for raising the federal minimum wage, making public colleges and universities tuition-free, and guaranteeing everyone in America has health care.

The anti-environment agenda of this admin is wrongheaded. Most Americans want to protect the environment and keep our air and water clean. This has to stop. http://thehill.com/policy/energy-environment/393213-trump-rescinds-obamas-policy-on-protecting-oceans
As our country moves toward legalizing marijuana, let's remember how many lives have been ruined because of our regressive policies. We must also focus on restorative justice.

Trump's pathological dishonesty is undermining our democracy, setting a terrible example for our children and isolating us from our democratic allies around the world.  Now is the time for the American people to fight back on every front.

Tornillo, Texas is the first site where hundreds of migrant children have been detained in temporary shelters and separated from their families. Join @VotoLatino today in Tornillo to say ENOUGH. Signup at: http://stopseparation.org #EndFamilyDetention

LORD,you have probed me,you know me: you know when I sit & stand;you understand my thoughts from afar. You sift through my travels & my rest;with all my ways you are familiar. Even before a word is on my tongue,LORD, you know it all. Psalms 139: 1-4

#SFPride was filled with love and passion. To everyone celebrating #Pride2018, we will not stop fighting until full equality under the law for all is achieved. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DgfglI3U8AAOe96.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DgfhUSdUYAMsm1o.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DgfhZbnVAAAXf61.jpg

El biólogo Ariel Ruiz Urquiola, víctima de la dictadura cubana se encuentra en huelga de hambre. Ruiz fue injustamente capturado por la policia y exigimos su libertad. #FreeAriel https://twitter.com/14ymedio/status/1010247124062175232 QT @14ymedio Ariel Ruiz Urquiola cumple seis días en huelga de hambre y sed https://www.14ymedio.com/nacional/Ariel-Ruiz-Urquiola-huelga-hambre_0_2459754012.html http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DgUeZ8KU8AAmFdW.jpg
Proud to march in the @SFPride parade today! Such amazing energy. A celebration of love and solidarity. #Pride2018 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DgeglPKUwAEWnSG.jpg
Excited to march in San Francisco’s Pride Parade today! Happy #Pride! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DgeIlShWsAAPppv.jpg

When you represent the billionaire class and have nothing relevant to say to working families, the only way you win elections is by suppressing the vote and making it harder for ordinary people to participate in our democracy. https://www.nytimes.com/2018/06/23/us/politics/voting-rights-alabama.html

RT @HarleyRouda I just got off the phone with @drhanskeirstead. We congratulated each other on a hard fought primary and he pledged his full support to our campaign to #flipthe48th and defeat @RepRohrabacher. #ThankYouHans
Biologist Ariel Ruiz Urquiola, victim of the Cuban dictatorship, is on a hunger strike. Ruiz was unjustly jailed by police forces, and we demand his immediate release. #FreeAriel

.@LenaWaithe is “disrupting the hell out of Hollywood" by ensuring diverse communities can turn on the TV and see vivid, funny, deeply real portrayals of people like themselves. I was proud to honor her at #SFPride2018 earlier today. #LoveIsLove http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DgfVYkMWsAIwcmG.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DgfVZEJXcAAn0Pz.jpg

There's a reason why Nikki Haley has tried to discredit the UN report on poverty in America. It's because in the wealthiest country in history, millions are living in abysmal poverty, have no health insurance, can't afford prescription drugs and can't find affordable housing.

I spoke with one woman from El Salvador at a CBP processing center. She  gave a policeman a drink of water, and the gangs came after her. She sold everything she had and fled with her 4-year-old son because their lives were in danger.

The government should be in the business of keeping families together, not tearing them apart. The mothers I spoke with this week think that they're alone. We need to remind them and everyone else that they are not alone and that we all stand with them. http://abc7.com/politics/sen-kamala-harris-visits-detained-migrant-mothers-at-border/3639033/

RT @eqca “We’ve seen this discrimination before. We saw it at a lunch counter, and now we see it at a cake counter. And we’ll have to fight it like we always have, standing together as a community.” – Senator @KamalaHarris at @alicelgbtdems Pride Breakfast #SFPride http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DgeH55xU8AAzNwE.jpg
To everyone marching, dancing, and chanting today at #SFPride2018 and across the country: We’re in this fight together. #LoveIsLove http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dgep4p5VAAACXzI.jpg
